answers.answer: Here is some causes of your problem, Chemical irritation, Senile pruritis, Atopic dermatitis,   Contact dermatitis, Infestations, Infection, Candida infection, Obstructive biliary disease, Chronic renal failure, Malignancy, Medications, Neurodermatitis, Diabetes, Peripheral nerve damage, Cholestasis disease of pregnancy,Underarm rash, Scabies, Psoriasis.Have you changed your laundry detergent?
maybe but check a skin doctor
I think I would see a dermatologist.

question: I have had itchy burning armpits for about 1 month. No rash and it hurts. I have not been using deordorant thinking it was caused from that.  I have been using witch hazel wipes. Could this be a side effect from my glaucoma eye drops. I have been on these for 4-5 years and this just started.
title: itcht burning armpits
